about.title: About
about.description1: And I am a Front-end Developer from Poznan, who is currently looking for a job.
about.description2: I have a huge passion for developing my skill and to use them in the interesting projects.

services.title: Services
services.question: What can I do for you?
services.offerDesc1: Creating with the use of the latest technologies in mind. CMS-based, single-page web applications or even regular landing pages.
services.offerDesc2: In terms of SEO, as well as checking and improving pages in terms of performance.
services.offerHeadline3: Cooperation with front-end teams as a freelancer or regular employee
services.offerDesc3: Work on small and large projects. Managing websites and Internet services. Customer contact and problem solving.
services.summary: ... and almost everything related to websites.
